Kyiv

Why go?

Rich history and culture

Kyiv is more than 1500 years old. It is the cradle of Eastern slavic culture and a place where a number of outstanding personalities lived, loved and created.
So just imagine how many great stories the city keeps.

Unique atmosphere

Kyiv has an atmosphere that you can’t find anywhere in Europe. It’s the mixture of ancient Slavic and European cultures, Soviet brutalism and Ukrainian spirit.
Kyiv is rebellious and conservative, luxurious and shabby at the same time.

Beautiful views

1/2 of Kyiv’s territory is occupied by parks and gardens. You can’t walk far without passing one. Picturesque Dnipro river, which runs through the middle of the city, provides sandy beaches and recreation areas in the very heart of the capital.

Reasonable prices

Dinner bill — $8
Ticket to museum — $2
Subway ticket — $0,2
Cup of coffee — $1
Taxi around centre — $3
Cocktail in bar — $3

Entertainment

More than 150 museums
World heritage sites
Stunning parks and river beaches
Numerous night clubs
Cultural events and festivals
Various art spaces
Restaurants and street food spots
Traditional food markets

Good location

Kyiv is the very heart of Europe.
The flight duration from Rome or Tel Aviv is about 3 hours. So for some of you it can be the weekend trip.

Nice people

The Guide

If you want to explore the city with a professional insider or find a friend in an unknown city just let me know and I promise you will fall in love with Kyiv.
My name is Anna and I deeply passionate about Kyiv and work as licenced tour guide for more than 5 years.

Fore more info about Kyiv visit my blog

Meet Kyiv tour

is the best way to make friends with the city in the quickest way, to discover the basics of its history and see the most important sights.
3-4 hours, 10 km, by foot/ car, ...$

Explore Kyiv (full-day) tour

is perfect when quick glance is not enough and you want at an easy pace admire the beauty of central district, visit hidden places and hear exciting stories. Three or four stops are usually made.
10 hours, 20 km, by foot/ car, ...$

Feel Kyiv (2-day) tour

is the possibility to see the city beyond touristic map, not only the centre but its suburbs, visit unique places and actual events, feel local life as it is.
20 hours, 30 km, by foot/ car, ...$

Taste Kyiv (gastronomic) tour

to explore the city centre including food markets and festivals, traditional cuisine, world’s fast food, classy restaurants, best coffee spots and bars.
Duration and locations are discussed.

Dream Kyiv tour

is arranged according to your personal requests. So if you want to see only all art galleries in the city or coffee shops, visit secret places and architecture of Soviet times — no problem. We can get pretty much anywhere you want to go in the city.
Duration and locations are discussed.
